name: Granulomatosis with Polyangiitis (GPA)
chief_complaint: I've had a persistent sinus infection, nosebleeds, and now I'm coughing up blood.
prognosis: Variable; early treatment improves outcomes, but relapses are common. Organ damage (e.g., kidney failure) may occur if untreated.
description: Granulomatosis with Polyangiitis (GPA) is a rare autoimmune disease causing vasculitis, primarily affecting small- to medium-sized blood vessels. It often involves the upper respiratory tract, lungs, and kidneys. Characterized by granuloma formation and necrotizing inflammation.
